body.bibl: Reinink, Gerrit J. “Pseudo-Methodius Und Die Legende Vom Römischen Endkaiser.” In The Use and Abuse of Eschatology in the Middle Ages: Proceedings of an International Colloquium Organized by the Instituut Voor Middeleeuwse Studies of the Katholieke Universiteit Leuven, May 14-16 1984, edited by Werner Verbeke, Daniel Verhelst, and Andries Welkenhuysen, 82–111.
